quests.desc: You are now playing a exciting session of TextWorld! Rest the shirt on the shelf.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in an attic.

 Look over there! a shelf. The shelf is usual.[if there is something on the s_0] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You can see a stand. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Hopefully this doesn't make you too upset.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You are in a scullery. A normal kind of place.



There is an unblocked exit to the east.

infos.name: shirt
infos.desc: The shirt seems out of place here

infos.name: pair of pants
infos.desc: The pair of pants is well-used.

objective: Your objective is to place the shirt on the shelf.

main_quest.desc: Your objective is to place the shirt on the shelf.
